variant=overtone-cui32stem
description=Create USB Interface STEM
group=Overtone Labs
platform=pic32
board=_BOARD_CUI32_
board.flags=-D_USE_USB_FOR_SERIAL_::-D_USB
ccflags=ffff
ldscript=chipKIT-application-32MX795F512${upload.${prefs:board.${prefs:board}.programmer}.ldsuffix}.ld
upload.protocol=stk500v2
upload.maximum_size=520192
upload.speed=115200
build.mcu=32MX795F512H
build.f_cpu=80000000L
build.core=pic32
build.variant=overtone-cui32stem
family=pic32
version=0.4
revision=2
core=chipkit
name=overtone-cui32stem
bootloader.file=${board:root}/bootloader
